name: tube-archivist
description: TubeArchivist is a self-hosted YouTube archiving and management solution. It downloads videos, indexes metadata, and offers search, playlists, and a web player to build a personal YouTube library.
features: YouTube downloading: Download videos from YouTube channels and playlists automatically.
Metadata indexing: Index video metadata including titles, descriptions, tags, and thumbnails for searchability.
Channel subscriptions: Subscribe to channels and automatically download new videos as they're published.
Playlist management: Organize videos into playlists for categorization and easy browsing.
Web player: Watch archived videos through a built-in web player without leaving the interface.
Search functionality: Search across all archived videos by title, description, channel, or tags.
Thumbnail generation: Generate and store video thumbnails for visual browsing of your library.
Comment archiving: Optionally archive video comments for complete preservation of content.
Subtitle download: Download and store subtitles in multiple languages for accessibility.
Quality selection: Choose video quality and format preferences for downloads to balance quality and storage.
Scheduled downloads: Set up automatic download schedules to keep your archive up to date.
Statistics: View statistics on your archive including total videos, storage used, and channel breakdowns.
